price: Namni yaadannoo (Qur’aana) kiyya irraa garagale, dhugumatti, isaaf jireenya dhiphootu jira; Guyyaa Qiyaamaas jaamaa gooneeti isa kaafna.”
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَن ذِكۡرِي فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ مَعِيشَةٗ ضَنكٗا وَنَحۡشُرُهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waman aʿraḍa ʿan dhik'rī fa-inna lahu maʿīshatan ḍankan wanaḥshuruhu yawma al-qiyāmati aʿmā
